bilingual.source: The actions of the terrorist are outrageous.
bilingual.target: 恐怖分子的行为令人发指。

bilingual.source: The police arrested a terrorist at the airport.
bilingual.target: 警察在机场逮捕了一名恐怖分子。

bilingual.source: The threat of the terrorist makes people uneasy.
bilingual.target: 恐怖分子的威胁让人们感到不安。

bilingual.source: The special forces raid the terrorist hideout.
bilingual.target: 特种部队突袭了恐怖分子的藏身处。

bilingual.source: The terrorist launched an attack in the city center.
bilingual.target: 恐怖分子在城市中心发动了袭击。

bilingual.source: The police successfully thwarted a terrorist attack.
bilingual.target: 警方成功阻止了一起恐怖分子袭击。

bilingual.source: The government is working hard to capture those terrorist.
bilingual.target: 政府正在努力抓捕那些恐怖分子。

bilingual.source: The terrorist was identified through surveillance footage.
bilingual.target: 恐怖分子通过监控录像被识别出来。

bilingual.source: The terrorist organization claimed responsibility for the attack.
bilingual.target: 恐怖分子组织声称对袭击事件负责。

bilingual.source: The government has increased security to prevent terrorist attacks.
bilingual.target: 政府加强了安保措施以防止恐怖分子袭击。

list.abstract: Terrorist，英语单词，名词、形容词，作名词时译为“恐怖主义者，恐怖分子”，作形容词时译为“恐怖主义者的，恐怖分子的”。

yingyinNormal.en: The translator at Lockhart/Gardner? He is not a terrorist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洛&加律所的翻译吗？他不是恐怖分子。

yingyinNormal.en: The fact is, every single one of these guys is a terrorist asshole until proven otherwise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实是，在没有证据证明之前，他们每个人都是恐怖分子。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it someone trying to get to you through me? Is it something to do with this terrorist thing you talked about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有人想借我对付你? 跟你说的恐怖分子有关?

yingyinNormal.en: He's right. Take out all legitimate personnel. Anyone that remains is a terrorist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，调走所有的合法公务人员，剩下的就都是那些恐怖分子了。

yingyinNormal.en: Samaritan is designed to be proactive. We can't afford to miss even one terrorist now, can we?
yingyinNormal.zh: 撒马利亚人的设定就是先发制人，现在可是一个恐怖分子都不能漏掉，是吧？

yingyinNormal.en: "Zayeed Shaheed is a guilty Muslim terrorist who bombed the Milwaukee Festival. Chubbysocks52."
yingyinNormal.zh: 扎耶德·沙希德是穆斯林恐怖分子，他在密尔沃基节引爆了炸弹 「肥袜52」。

yingyinNormal.en: It is, Your Honor. The terrorist successfully targeted was Zuri Aziz. He routinely used civilians as human shields.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，法官阁下，我们成功定位了恐怖分子祖里·阿齐，他常常利用平民作为人盾。

yingyinNormal.en: It's now on the Internet, you and your mistress. The whole world will know you are a terrorist. Good-bye, Mr. Hennessy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和你情妇的事现在都传到了网上，全世界都会知道你是个恐怖分子。再见，汉尼斯先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Lane had a ledger. It contain the identities of his operatives, his terrorist associates, the entire inner workings of the Syndicate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱恩有一份账册，详细记录了执行人员和恐怖分子合伙人的身份，以及辛迪加内部运作情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Just recently, a private military company led by a wanted terrorist named Mose Jakande, kidnapped a hacker known only by the name Ramsey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就在最近，由被通缉的恐怖分子莫斯·杰坎德领导的一间私人军事公司绑架了一名黑客，只知道名字叫拉姆齐。

yingyinNormal.en: This made possible by IMF agents who did willing provide the launch codes to a known terrorist. Do I have that right, agent Brandt?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这一切的起因，都是因为碟中谍小组的特工故意将导弹发射密码透漏给一个恐怖分子，我说对了吗，勃兰特特工？

yingyinNormal.en: And, this is your comment from two days ago? Zayeed is a terrorist, trained in Pakistan and sent to America undercover. Lotion my feet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是你两天前发表的评论吗？扎耶德是个恐怖分子，曾在巴基斯坦受训并被派到美国从事间谍活动。「洗脚大仙」

yingyinNormal.en: Normally, you and your team would be tasked with infiltrating and disrupting this terrorist network, but we have taken steps to ensure that this will not happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通常情况下，你和你的组员会被派去渗透并摧毁这个恐怖分子网络，但是我们已经采取措施确保这不会发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Good evening. I'm here to report to the American people and the world that early this morning, Special Forces killed the ICO terrorist Ahmed Al Ahmadi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上好。现在我向全体美国人民和全世界郑重报告在今天上午，特种部队击毙了哈里发国恐怖分子艾哈迈德·艾哈迈迪。

yingyinNormal.en: At the United Nations in New York, I worked to build more support for this coalition to cut off terrorist financing and to stop the flow of foreign fighters into and out of that region.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在纽约的联合国总部，我努力让这一联盟获得更多的支持，切断恐怖分子的资金来源，终止外国分子进出这一区域。

yingyinNormal.en: The tactic Khorasan uses to fund terrorist activity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是呼罗珊为恐怖主义活动提供资金的固有手段。

yingyinNormal.en: More data, more analysis, less likelihood of a terrorist attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数据越多，分析越全面，发生恐怖袭击的可能性就越低。

yingyinNormal.en: Solid information, a secret terrorist organization is planning an attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可靠情报，秘密恐怖组织正在策划一场袭击。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he's a terrorist sympathizer, and you're the wife of the governor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，但他支持恐怖主义，而且你是州长夫人。

yingyinNormal.en: Down there a Defense Department contract was just attacked in a terrorist attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国防部的合约机构遭到了恐怖攻击。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person who uses unlawful violence and intimidation, especially against civilians, in the pursuit of political aims

examination_example.sentence: The crash of EgyptAir Flight 804, which <highlight>terrorists</highlight> may have downed over the Mediterranean Sea, provides another tragic reminder of why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃及航空804号班机的坠毁，可能是被恐怖分子在地中海上击落的，它以悲剧的形式再次提醒我们为什么这么做。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Tourism throughout Turkey is expected to fall this year as the country has been the victim of several deadly <highlight>terrorist</highlight> attacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于土耳其已成为数起致命恐怖袭击的受害者，今年该国各地的旅游业预计都将下滑。

examination_example.sentence: Track down the organization responsible for the <highlight>terrorist</highlight> attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 追查对恐怖袭击负责的组织。
